evidence.source_document: Order Granting Joint Motion for Final Approval of Settlement Agreement

evidence.text: ORDER. Final Approval Hearing set for 9/5/2024 at 11:30 AM in Courtroom 15106 before Judge Robert S. Lasnik. The Court hereby preliminarily approves the Settlement Agreement, subject to further consideration at the Final Approval Hearing. Class members shall have until 7/11/2024, to file written objections.

extracted.value: 9/5/2024: Preliminary approval hearing set for settlement

evidence.text: Class members shall have until 7/11/2024, to file written objections.

extracted.value: 7/11/2024: Deadline for written objections to settlement
